description: This file defines a set of functions for managing courses in an educational content management system. It includes functions to list courses, fetch course details, upsert (update or insert) courses, delete courses, and manage user enrollments and progress tracking. The functions interact with a backend database via Supabase client functions and handle authentication and data retrieval/updates.

methods.name: listCourses()
methods.description: Lists all available courses, optionally ordered by creation date descending. Returns an empty array if not in Supabase mode or on error.

methods.name: getCourseById(id)
methods.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific course by ID, including associated lessons, for RLS compatibility. Returns null on error.

methods.name: upsertCourse(payload)
methods.description: Inserts or updates a course record in the database with provided payload, returning the persisted data.

methods.name: deleteCourse(id)
methods.description: Deletes a course record by ID from the database, returns true if successful.

methods.name: enroll(id)
methods.description: Enrolls the current user in a course, creating an enrollment record. Throws an error if the user is not authenticated.

methods.name: start(id)
methods.description: Marks a course as 'in_progress' for the current user, updating progress status and percentage. Throws if not authenticated.

methods.name: complete(id)
methods.description: Marks a course as 'completed' for the current user, updating progress status and percentage. Throws if not authenticated.
